request.description:
Given a content type payload containing field variables.
When sending a POST.
Expect that code is 200.
Expect content type is created with the provided fields.
Expect that new properties of content types are set (icon and sortOrder).

item.description:
These requests allow you to verify that dotCMS can retrieve a filtered paginated list of Content Types from a specific list of Sites only, and not from the whole repository. You can use both the Site's Identifier, or its Key -- aka, Site Name.

This suite is testing both the existing per-Site Endpoint -- flagged with **`(Legacy)`** -- and the new multi-site parameter.
